Axis Security and Event Staffing Services Venues Sign In Home Services Venues Sign In Simple, Full-Service Security and Event Staffing Since 2006, Axis, Inc. has become one of the premier security and event staffing companies on the East Coast. Our company has gained distinction from our annual work at The Bonnaroo Music & Arts Festival, Hangout Festival, Electric Forest Festival, and Forecastle Festival, among many others. We provide services for both indoor and outdoor events throughout the southeast including, but not limited to, Bristol Motor Speedway, The University of Tennessee, East Tennessee State University, Freedom Hall Civic Center, The Historic Tennessee Theatre, The U.S. Cellular Center Asheville, Ascend Amphitheater, Western Carolina University, and The Tivoli Theatre. Axis, Inc. is licensed and insured, and is equipped to handle all aspects of concert, festival, and sporting event staffing. This includes security, crowd management, ticket-taking, ushering, parking services, guest services, and consulting. Railroad Earth at Bijou Theatre Steve Miller Band at Tennessee Theatre Bonnaroo Music & Arts Festival Manchester, TN Electric Forest Festival Rothbury, Michigan WE'RE READY TO STAFF YOUR EVENT If you would like to learn more about Axis and our services, we would love to hear from you. For general inquiries, or if you would like more information about scheduling an event please email us or give us a call. admin@axissecurityinc.com 423-929-2947 JOIN OUR TEAM At Axis, we're committed to creating a positive, challenging environment in which our team can thrive. If you would like to learn more about working with our team, please click the button below to submit an application. Apply Now Since 2006, Axis, Inc. has become one of the premier security and event staffing companies on the East Coast. Our company has gained distinction from our annual work at The Bonnaroo Music & Arts Festival, Hangout Festival, Electric Forest Festival, and Forecastle Festival, among many others. We provide services for both indoor and outdoor events throughout the southeast including, but not limited to, Bristol Motor Speedway, The University of Tennessee, East Tennessee State University, Freedom Hall Civic Center, The Historic Tennessee Theatre, The U.S. Cellular Center Asheville, Ascend Amphitheater, Western Carolina University, and The Tivoli Theatre. Axis, Inc. is licensed and insured, and is equipped to handle all aspects of concert, festival, and sporting event staffing. This includes security, crowd management, ticket-taking, ushering, parking services, guest services, and consulting. Johnson City Office Phone: 423.929.2947 Fax: 423.929.1117 © Copyright 2025 Axis Security, Inc. All rights reserved.

About Us - Axis Europe Skip to content Search for: Sectors Commercial Heritage Public Sector Social Housing Services Cladding Services Commercial Fit Out Services EV Charge Point Installation Fire Stopping Services Mechanical & Electrical Painting and Decorating Planned Maintenance Responsive Repairs Retrofitting Services Roofing Services Projects Project Videos Frameworks Careers Apprenticeships Jobs Subcontractors Responsible Business Community People Sustainability Women In Construction Responsible Business Report The Axis Foundation About Locations News Contact Us Search for: Sectors Commercial Heritage Public Sector Social Housing Services Cladding Services Commercial Fit Out Services EV Charge Point Installation Fire Stopping Services Mechanical & Electrical Painting and Decorating Planned Maintenance Responsive Repairs Retrofitting Services Roofing Services Projects Project Videos Frameworks Careers Apprenticeships Jobs Subcontractors Responsible Business Community People Sustainability Women In Construction Responsible Business Report The Axis Foundation About Locations News Contact Us Sectors Commercial Heritage Public Sector Social Housing Services Cladding Services Commercial Fit Out Services EV Charge Point Installation Fire Stopping Services Mechanical & Electrical Painting and Decorating Planned Maintenance Responsive Repairs Retrofitting Services Roofing Services Projects Project Videos Frameworks Careers Apprenticeships Jobs Subcontractors Responsible Business Community People Sustainability Women In Construction Responsible Business Report The Axis Foundation About Locations News Contact Us Search for: About Paul Smart 2025-04-03T16:19:46+01:00 About Us We are striving to be the UK’s best property service partner. Find out about our story, values, people & responsibilities. Axis History Vision Future Axis About us Axis is a dependable property services partner with a reputation for delivering exceptional services. We work with some of the UK’s largest building owners, landlords and facilities managers to provide strategic building repairs, planned maintenance and improvement across all property sectors. History Our story Axis was established in 1986 by brothers who still run the business today. We’re a family company which is why our deep-rooted values have shaped the way we work – whether that’s with our clients, people or communities. With honesty, cooperation and respect, we are dedicated to building strong partnerships to deliver the results that they need. Because we are committed to not just doing a job, but to doing a job well, Axis has established and maintains a strong reputation nationally for providing exceptional service. Vision An exceptional service Although Axis has experienced continual growth since its establishment in 1986, we’re not aiming to be the biggest service provider – we do, however, intend to be the best. We are committed to working closely with our clients to deliver a high standard of service,  whilst investing in communities and working responsibly to minimise our impact on the environment. That’s our vision. Future Here today, here tomorrow Guided by our values, we will continue to grow, invest in the development of our people and communities whilst focusing on our sustainable practices to ensure a prosperous future for people and the environment. With a strong credit rating of 5A1 and a turnover of £230m, we have the financial stability and are deemed a safe pair of hands whom the industry, our people, partners and wider communities can depend on. Axis Europe A Values Led Business Our work is tailored to the requirements of each sector but our values remain the same. We are a values-led company with eight founding principles. Honesty Integrity, honesty and commitment breeds integrity, honesty and commitment Respect Everybody deserves respect People Train and develop people – their growth becomes our growth Diversity Embracing diversity will broaden our horizons Cooperation Harmony, cooperation, and openness helps build strong relationships Community A community we contribute to will welcome and value us Environment Protect our environment – protect our future Safety Commitment to health and safety benefits everyone A Values Led Business Our disciplines are tailored to the requirements of each sector but our values remain the same. We are a values-led company with eight founding principles. Anyone who comes into contact with us, at any level, will be treated according to these values. Our aim is for these values to be synonymous with Axis, and vice versa. Honesty Integrity, honesty and commitment breeds integrity, honesty and commitment Respect Everybody deserves respect People Train and develop people – their growth becomes our growth Diversity Embracing diversity will broaden our horizons Cooperation Harmony, cooperation, and openness helps build strong relationships Community A community we contribute to will welcome and value us Environment Protect our environment – protect our future Safety Commitment to health and safety benefits everyone A Responsible Business Taking action to address our wider economic, social and environmental impacts, we ensure a responsible approach to all areas of our business. An Equal Opportunities Employer We celebrate diversity and are dedicated to providing equal opportunities for all prospective employees and Axis people. Our Registered Charity Each year, we donate over £100,000 to our registered charity, The Axis Foundation, to support small, local and impactful causes and charities. A Sustainable Approach Protect our environment, protect our future. We are committed to the continual improvement of sustainability within the construction industry. Want to find out more about Axis? Get in contact with a member of the Axis team, who will be happy to assist you with your enquiry. Contact Us Leadership Team Our talented and experienced team of directors lead by example. They play a fundamental role in steering our development and growth, whilst guiding Axis people to be the best that they can be. John Hayes Founder and Non-executive Director Having founded the business in 1986, John is an active member of the Board of Directors, developing and implementing strategy. Richard Morris Group Director and Chief Executive Officer Richard is the new Chief Executive of Axis Europe, joining in 2024, and CLC Group and has a wealth of exceptional leadership experience. Tim Hayes Managing Director of Maintenance Leading our housing repairs and maintenance division, Tim oversees the delivery of 300,000 repairs annually. He joined the Axis in 1986. Joe Ibrahim Managing Director of Projects Steering our Projects and Painting division, Joe leads on operational, commercial, safety, and supply chain matters. He joined Axis in 1989. Maria Northwood Director of Business Support Maria leads on all HR functions at Axis including recruiting, development, and performance management. She joined Axis in 2004. Paul Smart Director of Marketing & Communications Paul has grown and implemented our marketing and communication strategy since 2007. He also sits on the Executive Team and Business Continuity Committee. Rickardo Santana Chief Finance Officer & Company Secretary Rick has responsibility for the finances at Axis and also acts as the Company Secretary working with the Board of Directors. He has been at the company since 2017. Neil Betton Chief Information Officer (IT & Digital) Heading up Axis’ IT & Digital teams, Neil is responsible for our digital strategy and has led the company’s digital transformation since 2012 when he joined Axis. Download our reports To find out more about Axis, download our most recent reports and statements. Apply Now Avail your dream Home with Axis Bank Home Loan and get 12 EMIs* waived off. *T&C apply Apply Now Get quick & easy Personal Loans with interest rates starting at 9.99% p.a. *T&C apply Apply Now login Home Media Centre Senior Management Amitabh Chaudhry Senior Management Amitabh Chaudhry Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer In a long and distinguished career, Amitabh has been unafraid to take risks, challenge norms and push the boundaries of conventional thinking across industries. Amitabh runs Axis Bank, a financial conglomerate, together with a world class leadership
            team and a clearly defined vision of being a bank that fulfils the aspirations of a new, resurgent India through smart banking solutions. Over the past five years, Axis Bank has turned in industry leading performance on growth, profitability,
            and sustainability through a mix of deep investments in digital, focus on customer experience, making a strategic bet on Bharat and being prudent on risk. The Bank also acquired the consumer business of Citibank India recently to strengthen
            its wealth and credit card portfolio. These efforts under his leadership are clearly visible in the upward trajectory of Axis Bank’s performance. Before joining Axis Bank, Amitabh had a long stint as the CEO of HDFC Life, when he built one of the most valued life insurance franchises in the country. He built a culture of product innovation and a digital-first approach, shaping the industry’s
            thought process and future aspirations. Amitabh started his career with Bank of America where he donned diverse roles like head of technology investment banking for Asia, regional finance head for wholesale bank and CFO (India). After 16 years
            of banking, he switched careers and became part of the founding leadership team at Infosys BPM in 2003. He built a successful process outsourcing business in his 8 years stint, that set a benchmark on the nature of work that could transition
            to India along with profitability. He also handled the Validation Services portfolio at Infosys. Amitabh is the Chairperson of the FICCI National Committee on Banking, since 2019. He has also served as Director on the board of several reputed organizations and has received numerous awards and recognitions. He is a director on the Boards of Axis Capital Limited, Axis Finance Limited and Axis Asset Management Company Limited. Amitabh is an Engineer from Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani, and holds a postgraduate degree in Business Management from IIM, Ahmedabad. CONTACT
